# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds expectations, and I am offering it to you at a special price of $1200000. I trust this offer will allow us to explore the potential synergy between our visions and values. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
